name: The Gatherer (TimirlanKenji)
description:
The little wanderer explores the floating islands. There are two sides to get to the finish line, which one will you choose?
Collect all coins and gems in this 2D-platformer.

CONTROLS
  • W/A/S/D — movement;
  • Shift — dash;
  • E — Interact;
  • SPACE— jump;
  • K— suicide;
  • ESC— exit game;
DEVELOPER
  • Timirlan Kenji — code, game design
SPECIAL THANKS

Epic Games for an amazing educational materials and assets.

Creators of AIVA for great audio generator.
